Title: Uniper, RWE secure three FSRUs for Germany, advancing the shift away from Russian gas
Description: German energy firms Uniper and RWE have secured three floating LNG import terminals, or floating storage regasification units ( FSRU) for Germany on behalf of the federal government, which is working to expedite plans to bring two LNG import projects online as it strives to cut its dependence on Russian piped gas imports.
Author: CK
